channel.title: I cant connect to any of my server im hosting
channel.description: yes i cant connect to any server im hosting i port forwarded and have no-ip and i put all my ips in the client places and i stilll cant connect even the ones i use to be able to connect to its like servers just stoped working for me? can anybody help with this???? with teamviewer or something?

item.title: I cant connect to any of my server im hosting
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you have not searched enough I could have easily found this

1 make a copy of your client folder
2. Go to the client-copy folder you just made with all the files
3. now change the ips from the no-ip to 127.0.0.1
4. save all the changes you make!
5. compile
6. run client and login
Note: no-ip is for others to connect not you

Read full topic
